title: Question 23
prompt: Which of the following sentences should be removed from the memorandum?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
Sentence 15 asks employees to clean their own dishes instead of leaving them in the sink.
Please prepare your thoughts prior to the meeting. We will finalize the dress code next week, and it will be implemented after the Winter break. Also, please remember to clean your own dishes instead of leaving them in the sink.
Although this information may be important for employees to understand, the memorandum is regarding employee dress codes. This sentence is not relevant to employee dress codes and should be removed.
